title: Runner submits snapshots and final report Snapshot

view.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report
view.subtitle: Final report artifact submitted.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Forgets to set buffer time between appointments". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Pause subscription (keep slot reserved)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.
